query.statement: SELECT A.ZKNUM ,A.ZSEQ ,A.TRAID ,C.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT ,A.MOB_NUMBER ,CASE WHEN A.ZTON = 'A' THEN '1 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'B' THEN '2.5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'C' THEN '3.5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'D' THEN '5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'E' THEN '8 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'F' THEN '11 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'G' THEN '18 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'H' THEN '25 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'I' THEN 'Trailer' WHEN A.ZTON = 'J' THEN '≈√πË' WHEN A.ZTON = 'K' THEN 'Trail-20' WHEN A.ZTON = 'L' THEN 'Trail-40' WHEN A.ZTON = 'M' THEN 'Trail-20 ø’∫π' WHEN A.ZTON = 'N' THEN 'Trail-40 ø’∫π' WHEN A.ZTON = 'O' THEN 'º≈∆≤' ELSE '' END AS ZTON FROM SAPHEE.ZLET041 A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET002 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.ZKNUM = B.ZKNUM AND A.ZKNUM2 = B.ZKNUM2 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 C ON A.TPLSTDT = C.LIFNR WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ZKNUM = #ZKNUM# AND A.ZKNUM2 = #ZKNUM2# UNION SELECT A.ZKNUM ,A.ZSEQ ,A.TRAID ,A.TPLSTDT ,A.MOB_NUMBER ,CASE WHEN A.ZTON = 'A' THEN '1 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'B' THEN '2.5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'C' THEN '3.5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'D' THEN '5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'E' THEN '8 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'F' THEN '11 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'G' THEN '18 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'H' THEN '25 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'I' THEN 'Trailer' WHEN A.ZTON = 'J' THEN '≈√πË' WHEN A.ZTON = 'K' THEN 'Trail-20' WHEN A.ZTON = 'L' THEN 'Trail-40' WHEN A.ZTON = 'M' THEN 'Trail-20 ø’∫π' WHEN A.ZTON = 'N' THEN 'Trail-40 ø’∫π' WHEN A.ZTON = 'O' THEN 'º≈∆≤' ELSE '' END AS ZTON FROM SAPHEE.ZLET041 A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET006 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.ZKNUM = B.ZKNUM AND A.ZKNUM2 = B.ZKNUM2 WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ZKNUM = #ZKNUM# AND A.ZKNUM2 = #ZKNUM2# ORDER BY ZSEQ ASC
